attributes.action: remove Stephen Plowden from the position of transport advisor to the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He has a discriminatory and very biased opinion when viewing motorcycles based on very unreliable evidence. His opinions are personal and not subjective and is therefore not fit to be a transport advisor.

rejection.details: Mr Plowden is not an advisor to the Government.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
